isis.stitle: BATTERY - BATTERY SAFETY - HANDLING BATTERY ACID (ELECTROLYTE)

svcproc.title: HANDLING BATTERY ACID (ELECTROLYTE)
svcproc.para: Exercise extreme caution to avoid splashing or spilling battery acid (electrolyte). Always wear protective goggles and protective clothing when pouring or mixing battery acid (electrolyte).

item.para: Drink large quantities of water or milk and consult a physician immediately.

svcproc.para: If battery acid (electrolyte) comes in contact with the eye(s):

item.para: Force eye(s) open and flush repeatedly with clean, cool water for at least five minutes. Consult physician immediately.

svcproc.para: If battery acid (electrolyte) comes in contact with clothing or vehicle surface:

item.para: Neutralize immediately with a solution of baking soda and water. Flush with clean water.
